name: Yen Sid
description: Master Yen Sidis a powerful sorcerer who made his Disney debut inFantasia. He appears inKingdom Hearts II,Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep,Kingdom Hearts codedandKingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distanceas a retiredKeyblade Master, renowned for his wisdom and command over the arts of magic; though no longer an active Keyblade Master, he still keeps a close watch on the balance betweenLightandDarkness. He was onceMickey Mouse's master, and taught him everything he knows of magic and the Keyblade. Hi...

attributes.Japanese: イェン・シッド , Yen Shiddo ?

name: Rapunzel
description: Rapunzel is full of spirit and energy, but throughout her life she wanted freedom and does not want to be locked away in a tower for so long because of her kidnapper Gothel. Despite her gentle disposition and overall cautious nature (due to her lack of exposure to the outside world), she shows courage to Sora and Flynn, aiding them in battle to prove she can handle what’s out there.

name: Boo
description: Boois a character inKingdom Hearts III.

name: Replica Xehanort
description: These twelve replicas are capable of altering their appearance to become identical to Master Xehanort, with them initially appearing this way. However, their true appearance soon consists of a black armor covered with a dark purple tunic decorated with red, with clawed gloves, high-heeled boots and a mask of silver goat hiding their faces.

attributes.Japanese: レプリカ・ゼアノート , Repurika Zeanōto ?

name: Moogle
description: Mooglesare creatures that appear in every game in theKingdom Heartsseries. They made their first appearance inKingdom Heartsand have been present in different numbers since. InKingdom Hearts: Chain of MemoriesandKingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories, Moogles sell various cards to Sora in Moogle Rooms, and inKingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep,Kingdom Hearts Re:codedandKingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distancethey sell Commands that can be installed on to the Command Deck in holographic versions of their...

name: Kristoff
description: Kristoff is first seen withAnna,Sven, andOlafat the frozen lake where they first meetSora,Donald, andGoofy. They introduce themselves and become acquainted. When Sora finds outElsais Anna's sister, he tells them that she is in trouble. Kristoff then goes off with Sven and Olaf to find food while Anna and Sora remain behind to talk. The three are then ambushed byHeartless, but they manage to evade them, with only Olaf's body breaking apart. After Sora and the others find and reassemble his bod...

name: Mother Gothel
description: Mother Gothelis a character and villain inKingdom Hearts III. She appears as an antagonist in her homeworld "Kingdom of Corona."

name: Stitch
description: He was originally found inDeep Spaceon a prison ship, where he allied with Terra, Ventus, and Aqua as a party member andDimension Link, but eventually escaped and made his way toRadiant Garden, where he fought alongside Sora and his friends in theBattle of the 1000 Heartless. Afterward, he joined them as aSummon. He is also one of the few Disney characters that appears outside his homeworld.

attributes.Japanese: スティッチ / 試作品626号 , Sutitchi / Shisakuhin 626-gō ?

name: Yozora
description: Yozora's appearance bears a great resemblance toRiku. He has silver hair in a similar style to Riku's, and uniquely has two different eye colors as a result ofheterochromia iridium; his right eye being a light blue color, and his left eye being a dark red color. His outfit also appears to be a slightly darker version of Riku's, with a shoulder emblem depicting a skull crescent accompanied by twoKeyblades. However, as noted by Yozora, this appearance is not his true form.

name: Demyx
description: Demyx plays a minor role inKingdom Hearts II, where he is tasked with tracking downSorato liberateRoxas's "true disposition". Although he dislikes fighting, he is directed to use "aggression" against Sora and his companions to bring out Roxas. Demyx is a playable character inMission ModeinKingdom Hearts 358/2 Days.

attributes.Membership: Organization XIII , No. IX (previous) Real Organization XIII (reserve

name: Huey, Dewey, and Louie
description: InKingdom Hearts, they work in the item shop in the First District ofTraverse Town. Here, the three take turns selling items. InKingdom Hearts II, they run an item shop, a weapon shop, and an accessory shop inHollow Bastion/Radiant Garden. In both endings, they are all seen going back toDisney Castle.

attributes.Japanese: ヒューイ, デューイ, ルーイ , Hyūi, Dyūi, Rūi ?
attributes.Residence: Twilight Town Traverse Town (previous) Radiant Garden (previous

name: Pence
description: A good-humored boy with an even temper, he is close to Olette like a brother. He also usually ends up being dragged by Olette to help her with her shopping. He has a knowledgeable account of theSeven Wondersof Twilight Town and is apparently skilled with computers as he manages to access the computer in the mansion. Unlike Roxas and Hayner, Pence is only seen fighting once, trying (and failing) to defendKairifromAxel.

name: Ienzo
description: IenzoisAnsem the Wise’s youngest apprentice, and the complete self ofZexion. At a young age, Ienzo lost his parents from unknown causes, and came under the care ofEvenand the other apprentices. AfterXehanortbecame an apprentice to Ansem, Xehanort manipulated the other apprentices into immersing themselves into the darkness from their research on the heart, causing them to split intoHeartlessandNobodies. However, Ienzo’s strong will enabled his body to become his Nobody self Zexion, one of the...

name: Pete
description: Peteis a major recurring antagonist in theKingdom Heartsseries. A former steamboat captain in hisearlier days, he is the arch-enemy ofMickey,DonaldandGoofy, and used to live inDisney Town, but was cast into another dimension byQueen Minniefor the mischief he caused. He was later released from this imprisonment byMaleficent.

attributes.Residence: Hollow Bastion (KH2, coded) Country of the Musketeers (DDD
attributes.Va Japanese: Tōru Ōhira (KH2, coded, DDD, coded cinematic) Katsuhiro Kitagawa (KH3

name: Olaf
description: Olafis a character who appears inKingdom Hearts III. He is an enchanted snowman, created byElsawho represents the living embodiment of the bond betweenAnnaand Elsa, and the memories of their youth.

name: Megara
description: Megara has, despite her secret love for Hercules, a rather negative outlook on life, as she is secretly allied with Hades. She tries to sever these bonds, but must ask for help from Sora, as she is far too vulnerable to confront the god. She wants to let Hercules know of her true feelings, but fears that this could open a weakness to Hades. The Lord of the Dead knows of Herc's feelings for the girl, however, and uses her as a "pawn" to get the hero to bend to his desires.

name: Daisy Duck
description: Daisy Duck is a close friend ofQueen Minnieof Disney Castle as well as the inhabitants of Disney Town. She is the love of court magician Donald Duck and shows a great sense of strong affinity towards him. She has a short temper much like her love's but controls it until Donald's negligence to contact nor visit her at the Disney Castle during his Gummi travels.

attributes.Japanese: デイジーダック , Deijī Dakku ?
attributes.Origin: Don Donald Mr. Duck Steps Out

name: Sven
description: Svenis a character inKingdom Hearts III, and the best friend and loyal companion ofKristoff.

name: Gopher
description: Gofuris a resident of the100 Acre Woodand a friend ofWinnie the Pooh. Though the 100 Acre Wood appears in previous games, Gopher does not appear untilKingdom Hearts II. He is first met inPiglet's House. Of all residents, he is the only one who literally lives underground, and digs through the ground to make a living. During theHunny Slidermini-game, Gopher helps by acting as a buffer between Pooh and pieces of wood or other obstacles.

attributes.Origin: Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree

name: Vanitas
description: Vanitas, also known asThe Masked Boy(仮面の少年,Kamen no Shōnen?), is aKeybladewielder, the creation and second apprentice ofMaster Xehanort, the embodiment of the extracted darkness fromVentus's heart, and the progenitor of theUnversed. Vanitas is one of the main villains inKingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep, and a supporting villain inKingdom Hearts IIIas Rank XI of thereal Organization XIII.

name: Marshmallow
description: He is shown to be a loyal and prudent bodyguard who keeps every intruder outside of Elsa's castle. However, he is shown to be relentless at the slightest sign of provocation. WhenElsais taken away, Marshmallow is shown to be helpless and desperate. Sometime afterMaster Xehanort's defeat, he is shown picking up Olaf's parts while smiling, showing a playful side.

name: Ansem, Seeker of Darkness
description: Due to him having intentionally separated his heart from his body and soul before he gave into the darkness, Ansem retained his selfhood and intelligence after his transformation into a Heartless. Because he could think out his plans and pass for a human, he was able to destroy nearly every world in the Kingdom Hearts universe without revealing his identity, up until he confrontedSoraat theFinal KeyholeinHollow Bastion.

attributes.Japanese: 闇の探求者 アンセム , Yami no Tankyūsha Ansemu ? , lit. Ansem, Seeker of Darkness

name: Mickey Mouse
description: Mickey Mouse, often referred to asKing Mickeyor The King, is the king ofDisney CastleandQueen Minnie's husband. He travels the worlds battling the forces of darkness and is aKeyblade Master, and the chosen Keyblade wielder for theRealm of Darkness, though he follows the path of light. Originally believing that the darkness had to be eliminated, he eventually realized that light and darkness are interdependent and cannot exist without the other due to his encounters withRiku. Due to his quests...

attributes.Japanese: ミッキーマウス , Mikkī Mausu ? , lit. Mickey Mouse

name: Kraken
description: The Kraken is a gigantic cephalopod-like beast, with a squid-like mantle, a number of long, suckered tentacles at the base of its head. It also has a long, sharp tail similar to a squid and large round eyes with orange irises and black pupils. It had a large, maw-like mouth surrounded by fangs below its large eyes, and a massive body at least twice as long as its tentacles.

attributes.Origin: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

name: Pluto
description: Pluto is Mickey’s loyal friend. Although he does not appear often with his master, their friendship is easily seen. In Kingdom Hearts II, Pluto is shown to take a liking to Kairi, and becomes her source of comfort, When Axel kidnaps Kairi, Pluto pursues the two through a Corridor of Darkness, and later comforts her while they were locked in the Castle's basement.

attributes.Residence: Disney Town (BBS) Country of the Musketeers (DDD

name: Flynn Rider
description: Flynn Rider, whose real name isEugene Fitzherbert, is a character inKingdom Hearts III.

attributes.Japanese: フリン・ライダー , Furin Raidā ?

name: Maximus
description: Maximus is a large white horse with a blond mane and tail, and brown eyes. He wears a distinct saddle with the sun symbol of the kingdom. At the start of his appearances, Maximus' mane was tied up in braids; after falling down a cliff during a scuffle with Rider, the braids were loosened, giving Maximus a wilder look.

name: Philoctetes
description: Phil is a grumpy yet caring satyr with high expectations. He lives on with a dream of training the ultimate hero, wanting a picture of them to be hung in the stars and for everyone to acknowledge his accomplishment. This had yet to happen, at least until Sora, Donald, and Goofy showed up at Olympus Coliseum in the firstKingdom Hearts. Phil put them through training in the games and showed them the great praise he had for Hercules. He also showed genuine concern when the friends tackled Cerber...

attributes.Va Japanese: Ichirō Nagai GET UP ON THE HYDRA'S BACK!

name: Baymax
description: He is a personal healthcare companion originally designed by Tadashi Hamada. After theoriginal Baymaxwas lost, Tadashi's younger brother,Hiro Hamada, remade him and upgraded him to "Baymax 2.0."

name: Anna
description: Anna is depicted as a carefree, passionate, and heartwarming person, who believes in the best of people even when they're at their worst, particularly Elsa. Years of isolation from the world and her sister has left Anna lonely, but her pure heart kept her strong. She is also selfless, as she willingly sacrificed herself to protect Elsa.

attributes.Va English: Kristen Bell Livvy Stubenraunch (child) Katie Lopez (child, singing

name: Hercules
description: Hercules is shown to be sturdy, yet sensitive, willing to withstand hours of intense training at the hands of his mentor, Phil. He has a genuine love for Megara, and is ready to sacrifice even his own life for her. And yet, he is not without fault, as insults from Hades and a series of tough matches, including a loss to the Hydra, cause the hero to doubt his worth. It's when his friends' lives are most in danger that Hercules realizes he's not worthless, and that, in his words, "A true hero i...

attributes.Family: Hera (mother) Zeus (father) Hades (paternal uncle) Apollo (half-brother) Athena (half-sister) Hermes (half-brother) Megara (girlfriend
attributes.Va English: Sean Astin (KH) Tate Donovan (KH2, Re:coded, KH3) Josh Keaton (young

name: Young Xehanort
description: At some point in time, he was gifted the power to transcend time by hisfuture Heartlessin order to assemble a new Organization XIII in the future, consisting entirely of thirteen vessels infused with a fragment of his heart.

attributes.Japanese: ヤング・ゼアノート , Yangu Zeanōto ?
attributes.Weapon: Keyblade ( Young Xehanort's Keyblade ) Energy Blades

name: Rabbit
description: His house is the host for theBlock Tiggermini game in the 100 Acre Wood, whilst the gate at the back of his house is the host for the Veggie Panic mini game inKingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories. Rabbit appears inKingdom Hearts III, in which players are able to play garden themed minigames.

attributes.Origin: Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree

name: Tia Dalma
description: Tia Dalma's personality is flirty and playful (according to the legend, Calypso was something of a seductress), and she enjoys speaking in riddles. She speaks with a thick West Indian accent, and all her "th"s come out as "d"s. Her language is Jamaican Patois, so she often uses grammatically strange phrases, such as "him carve out him heart."

attributes.Japanese: ティア・ダルマ , Tia Daruma ?
attributes.Origin: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

name: Mike Wazowski
description: Mike Mazorciis a green cyclops fromMonstropolisinKingdom Hearts III.

name: Lingering Will
description: Lingering Will(留まりし思念,Todomarishi Shinen?)GameplayBiographical informationOriginallyTerraResidenceKeyblade GraveyardWeaponEnds of the EarthBehind the scenesEnglish VAJason DohringJapanese VARyōtarō Okiayu

attributes.Japanese: 留まりし思念 , Todomarishi Shinen ?

name: Tigger
description: Tigger has a cheerful and out-going disposition. He is very competitive (in a friendly way) and has complete confidence in himself. Although he can seem very arrogant, he has a heart of gold and is willing to do anything to help his friends. While friendly in terms of the Hundred Acre Wood's storyline, Tigger is often found bothersome at times, as he engages Sora in many puzzles and/or games that involve his love for bouncing.

attributes.Origin: Winnie the Pooh and the Blustery Day

name: Xigbar
description: WhileRoxaswas still a part of Organization XIII, Xigbar would occasionally assist him in some of his missions and lounge in the Grey Area with the other Organization members. Xigbar is also featured as a playable character inMission ModeinKingdom Hearts 358/2 Days.

attributes.Membership: Organization XIII , No. II (previous) Real Organization XIII , No. IV

name: Larxene
description: She is one of the members stationed atCastle OblivionduringKingdom Hearts: Chain of Memoriesand is part of an internal struggle between the senior and rookie members. However, her ploy to overthrow the Organization withMarluxiais derailed byAxel, and Larxene is ultimately killed bySora, making her the second member of the Organization to fall. Larxene also appears as a playable character in the non-canonicalMission ModeofKingdom Hearts 358/2 Daysand is the first playable female character in t...

attributes.Membership: Organization XIII , No. XII (previous) Real Organization XIII , No. VI
attributes.Va Japanese: Rieko Katayama (CoM) Yūko Miyamura (Re:CoM, 358, KH2FM, KHIII

name: Aced
description: Acedis aKeyblade MasterandForetellerwho appears inKingdom Hearts χ. He leads theUrsus Unionand is one of the six apprentices of theMaster of Masters.

attributes.Japanese: 予知者アセッド , Yochisha Aseddo ? , lit. Foreteller Aced

name: Aqua
description: Her name is Latin for "water", whileKairi's name in Japanese means "sea". The only connection between the two is that Aqua met Kairi inRadiant GardeninKingdom Hearts Birth by Sleepand put a protective spell on her necklace, which later brought Kairi to Destiny Islands. Kairi, by accidentallytouching Aqua's Keybladeduring this time, also inherited the Keyblade from Aqua. The official Japanese website refers to Aqua as the "Dancing Waters Forming Bonds"(絆繋ぐ舞水,Kizuna Tsunagu Busui?).

name: Hayner
description: The Hayner from theSimulated Twilight Townis also best friends withRoxas. He also appears inKingdom Hearts 358/2 DaysandKingdom Hearts IIIalongside Pence and Olette.

name: Hades
description: Hades is one of the most temperamental characters in the series. Although others are shown to be hot-headed, Hades bursts out in fury on a more regular basis. When Hades gets mad, he explodes into a red pillar of fire and his normal blue colored "hair" burns red (which is unorthodox since blue fire is warmer than red fire). Also, while Hades is infuriated, it is shown that he is invulnerable and much more forceful than in his normal state.

attributes.Family: Zeus (brother) Hera (sister) Hercules (nephew) Apollo (nephew) Athena (niece) Hermes (nephew

name: Invi
description: As the leader of the Anguis union, she conducts herself with high moral standards. She has confidence in the Master of Masters teachings and will vehemently defend him against any doubters of his teachings.

attributes.Japanese: 予知者インヴィ , Yochisha Invi ?

name: Jiminy Cricket
description: Jiminy is a friendly and helpful individual with a strong moral compass, as expected of the being assigned to serve asPinocchio's conscience. Jiminy is a good record keeper with a knack for keeping track of everything he comes across, a talent which he happily shares with Sora, Donald and Goofy. DuringKingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories, Jiminy proved to be wise and a true friend to Sora.

attributes.Japanese: ジミニー・クリケット , Jiminī Kuriketto ?
attributes.Va English: Eddie Carroll (KH, KH2, Re:CoM) Phil Snyder (coded cinematic, DDD) Joe Ochman (Re:coded, KH3
attributes.Va Japanese: Kaneta Kimotsuki (KH, KH2, Re:CoM, coded, Re:coded, DDD, coded cinematic) Yohei Tadano (KH3

name: Jack Sparrow
description: Captain Jack Sparrowis a crafty and potentially dangerous pirate who inhabitsPort Royal. After being freed from jail byWill Turner, he sets off to reclaim his stolen ship, theBlack Pearl, which was taken over byCaptain Barbossa.

attributes.Japanese: ジャック・スパロウ , Jakku Suparou ?
attributes.Origin: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

name: Riku
description: Rikuis a life-long friend and rival ofSora, and he plays a key role in theKingdom Hearts Series. Riku is fromDestiny Islandsand is a childhood friend of Sora andKairi. Later in the series, he becomes a Keyblade master that has the power of light and darkness, and is always ready to sacrifice himself to protect his friends. Riku is the original persona ofhis own replica.

attributes.Va English: David Gallagher Ty Panitz (young) Richard Epcar (as Ansem
attributes.Va Japanese: Mamoru Miyano Eiji Shima (young) Akio Otsuka (as Ansem

name: Scrooge McDuck
description: Before the events ofKingdom Hearts, Scrooge McDuck traveled withKing Mickeyon aGummi Shiptrying to make a Gummi Highway and setting up a business empire. They had to part ways when theHeartlessstarted to appear in theRealm of Light.

attributes.Family: Donald Duck (nephew) Huey, Dewey, and Louie (great-nephews

name: Buzz Lightyear
description: Buzz is good friends with Woody, who helped him through his early delusional phase of believing he was the actual Buzz Lightyear character instead of a toy. He is also a voice of reason and reassurance among his friends; he tends to calm the normally nervous Rex by complimenting him on even accidental help he gives and makes simple tasks seem very important to give his friend confidence. Buzz is cautious and skeptical following the disappearance of his friends; he believes the best course of ...

attributes.Japanese: バズ・ライトイヤー , Bazu Raitoiyā ?

name: Dark Riku
description: As one of the few time-traveling members of the Organization, Dark Riku was given a new refinedreplicabody to use as a vessel for his heart, and would additionally be infused with a fragment ofMaster Xehanort's heart alongside the rest of his fellow Organization members.

attributes.Japanese: ダーク・リク , Dāku Riku ?
